pageContent.title: Makes Sense Now
pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Makes Sense Now</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">“I do see the importance of being aware of all the options. It won’t always be a simple decision on how to treat hyponatremia, but being thoroughly informed may help me make better decisions.”</welcomeText>
